title: VA - Pavarotti & Friends for the children of Liberia [1998]

Pavarotti & Friends for the Children of Liberia
1998

With: Jon Bon Jovi, Spice Girls, Trisha Yearwood, Celine Dion,
Stevie Wonder, The Corrs, Vanessa Williams, Pino Daniele,
Florent Pagny, Natalie Cole & Zucchero

Liberian Children's Choir (director: Edwin Gibson)
Corale Voci Bianche (director: Silvia Rossi)
Orchestra Filarmonica di Torino / Marco Boemi / Jose Molina
Producers: Phil Ramone, Andrew Cornall
Recorded: Parco Novi Sad, Modena, June 1998

With art work
